job_details.Vacaturetitel: Data Architect - Principal Machine Learning Engineer (all genders)
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Set standards for engineering excellence and act as the technical guide, providing guidance to both product and technical colleagues within the team.
     * Co-represent the Tribe's engineering at the highest levels (CTO, CPO conversations)
     * Own architectural decisions in the tribe and influence data architecture in the wider organization.
     * Being a role model for a specific model / process / language / algorithm / product for engineers in the team and in the chapter.
     * Work closely with engineers and data scientists in the organization in order to determine needs for new software, platforms and applications both in functional and non-functional requirements.
     * Alignment with engineering and data managers on overall technical vision for involved squads.
     * Develop and implement technical product specifications in Data Science, Data Engineering and Machine Learning Engineering domains.
     * Pay attention to system integration, sustainability and feasibility with an eye on the overall list of services and how new ones can integrate within the overall system.
     * Manage all phases of technology development.
     * Oversee and supervise the work of the development teams and guide engineers in data engineering and machine learning engineering chapters.
     * Have an eye on Pull Requests and suggest improvements via objective input backed up with resources to help guide the engineers for better quality in the future.
     * Suggest and implement solutions (either partially like spikes or via POCs) for process improvement.
     * Adhere to quality, security and scalability guidelines.
     * Being a technical representative of the data organization for internal and external events.
job_details.full_text:
Data Architect - Principal Machine Learning Engineer (all genders)

* Set standards for engineering excellence and act as the technical guide, providing guidance to both product and technical colleagues within the team.
     * Co-represent the Tribe's engineering at the highest levels (CTO, CPO conversations)
     * Own architectural decisions in the tribe and influence data architecture in the wider organization.
     * Being a role model for a specific model / process / language / algorithm / product for engineers in the team and in the chapter.
     * Work closely with engineers and data scientists in the organization in order to determine needs for new software, platforms and applications both in functional and non-functional requirements.
     * Alignment with engineering and data managers on overall technical vision for involved squads.
     * Develop and implement technical product specifications in Data Science, Data Engineering and Machine Learning Engineering domains.
     * Pay attention to system integration, sustainability and feasibility with an eye on the overall list of services and how new ones can integrate within the overall system.
     * Manage all phases of technology development.
     * Oversee and supervise the work of the development teams and guide engineers in data engineering and machine learning engineering chapters.
     * Have an eye on Pull Requests and suggest improvements via objective input backed up with resources to help guide the engineers for better quality in the future.
     * Suggest and implement solutions (either partially like spikes or via POCs) for process improvement.
     * Adhere to quality, security and scalability guidelines.
     * Being a technical representative of the data organization for internal and external events.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and implementing technical product specifications in Data Science, Data Engineering, and Machine Learning Engineering domains. It highlights responsibilities like setting engineering standards, guiding technical colleagues, owning architectural decisions, and managing technology development phases. The focus on 'Machine Learning Engineering' and the mention of 'data engineering' and 'data science' align strongly with the core responsibilities of an ML Engineer, particularly in developing and implementing models and systems, rather than the generative AI focus of a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'determine needs for new software, platforms and applications both in functional and non-functional requirements' indicates an understanding of business needs and translating them into technical requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: determine needs for new software, platforms and applications both in functional and non-functional requirements

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Alignment with engineering and data managers on overall technical vision for involved squads' shows an understanding of strategic alignment within the business.
job_tasks.phrase: Alignment with engineering and data managers on overall technical vision for involved squads

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop and implement technical product specifications in Data Science, Data Engineering and Machine Learning Engineering domains' explicitly mentions Data Engineering as a domain of work.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and implement technical product specifications in Data Science, Data Engineering and Machine Learning Engineering domains

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'guide engineers in data engineering and machine learning engineering chapters' indicates a role in guiding data engineering practices.
job_tasks.phrase: guide engineers in data engineering and machine learning engineering chapters

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop and implement technical product specifications in Data Science, Data Engineering and Machine Learning Engineering domains' includes Machine Learning Engineering, which involves model development.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and implement technical product specifications in Data Science, Data Engineering and Machine Learning Engineering domains

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Being a role model for a specific model / process / language / algorithm / product for engineers in the team and in the chapter' implies deep knowledge and guidance on models and algorithms.
job_tasks.phrase: Being a role model for a specific model / process / language / algorithm / product for engineers in the team and in the chapter

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'determine needs for new software, platforms and applications' points to the development of new software and applications.
job_tasks.phrase: determine needs for new software, platforms and applications

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Manage all phases of technology development' encompasses the full lifecycle of software and technology development.
job_tasks.phrase: Manage all phases of technology development

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Suggest and implement solutions (either partially like spikes or via POCs) for process improvement' involves developing and implementing technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: Suggest and implement solutions (either partially like spikes or via POCs) for process improvement

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Adhere to quality, security and scalability guidelines' is a key aspect of ensuring production-grade systems, which is central to MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Adhere to quality, security and scalability guidelines

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Pay attention to system integration, sustainability and feasibility with an eye on the overall list of services and how new ones can integrate within the overall system' addresses the operational aspects of deploying and maintaining systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Pay attention to system integration, sustainability and feasibility with an eye on the overall list of services and how new ones can integrate within the overall system

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Oversee and supervise the work of the development teams and guide engineers in data engineering and machine learning engineering chapters' implies managing the deployment and maintenance of ML systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Oversee and supervise the work of the development teams and guide engineers in data engineering and machine learning engineering chapters
